name: temp-mailer
title: Temp Mailer
description: Read & create temp mail addresses via Temp Mail Plus API
author: halitsever

commands.name: set-new-temp-mail-address
commands.title: Set New Temp Mail Address
commands.subtitle: Set (create) new temp mail address
